about_the_game:
This DLC contains one Hunter and two Weapons:

- The Gunslinger (Hunter)
- The Accomplice (Ranger 73 Aperture)
- Felon's Six (Scottfield)


The Gunslinger

The Gunslinger, an outlaw by the name of May Belle and presumed dead in her home state, was one of the few to narrowly escape the law’s clutches.


Felon’s Six (Scottfield Model 3)

A final jailbreak, indebted to Felon’s Six as she dubbed it, set her on a path back East, to scope out any means of earning a living through lead.


The Accomplice (Winfield M1873 Aperture)

With The Accomplice, reliable as ever, she found what she sought deep in the Bayou, on the frontier between our world and another.



There are those unsuited to a law-abiding life. Those who had a code of ethics that ran contrary to the general consensus, who sought out thrill over security, and solved their disputes with their own mettle. The lawless frontier once offered opportunities abound for such people, but no longer. Crisscrossed with railways and checkerboarded with towns, wilderness only flourished in preserves, and the long arm of the law flexed its muscles.

The Gunslinger, an outlaw by the name of May Belle and presumed dead in her home state, was one of the few to narrowly escape the law’s clutches. A final jailbreak, indebted to Felon’s Six as she dubbed it, set her on a path back East, to scope out any means of earning a living through lead. With The Accomplice, reliable as ever, she found what she sought deep in the Bayou, on the frontier between our world and another.

- The Gunslinger (Hunter)
- The Accomplice (Ranger 73 Aperture)

A final jailbreak, indebted to Felon’s Six as she dubbed it, set her on a path back East, to scope out any means of earning a living through lead.

With The Accomplice, reliable as ever, she found what she sought deep in the Bayou, on the frontier between our world and another.



There are those unsuited to a law-abiding life. Those who had a code of ethics that ran contrary to the general consensus, who sought out thrill over security, and solved their disputes with their own mettle. The lawless frontier once offered opportunities abound for such people, but no longer. Crisscrossed with railways and checkerboarded with towns, wilderness only flourished in preserves, and the long arm of the law flexed its muscles.

With The Accomplice, reliable as ever, she found what she sought deep in the Bayou, on the frontier between our world and another.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - The Lawless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 @ 3.3GHz (4th Generation) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 TI or AMD Radeon R7 370, with a minimum of 3GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
  • Additional Notes: Best experienced with headphones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 @ 3.3Ghz (6th Generation) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 390X, with a minimum of 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
  • Additional Notes: Best experienced with headphones

short_description: This DLC contains one Hunter and two Weapons: - The Gunslinger (Hunter) - The Accomplice (Ranger 73 Aperture) - Felon's Six (Scottfield)
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Turkish, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
